•	SAP PM data entry and PM analysis', 'title': 'Maintenece Supervisor ', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Argentina, Buenos Aires', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'YPF', 'description': 'In-Company Training for 1300 hours (8 months) divided into three stages: 1) Overview 2) Drilling and Production School 3) Specialization in Engineering and Maintenance Management 1) Weekly modules corresponding to: Introduction to YPF were taken during the Overview and Generic Activities Oral Presentation, Impact and Influence and Project Management Courses Health and Environment Exploratory Principles: Petroleum Geology and Sedimentary Environments Drilling Engineering Well Profiling Reservoir Geology Reservoir Engineering Underground Production Engineering Surface Production Engineering Economic Evaluations 2) Drilling and production schools were run by Senda Team SRL for 2 weeks. 3) Postgraduate from the Austral University of Specialization in Engineering and Maintenance Management for 4 months (program of modules adjusted to said period of time)', 'title': 'NNPP - Master E&P - Maintenance Upstream Specialization', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 14266, 'name': 'Olam International', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQF9yx_6p4_FbA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856057179?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=28G5qMJftVq_HKMGKtf9lVXfxQfzJj6m9GPUBxsTkag', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/olam-international/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Dalmacio Velez, Argentina ', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'company': 'Olam', 'description': '•	Professional Practices for university degree
